text: Aur jab unn per mojen saeebanon ki tarah chah jati hain to woh (nihayat) khuloos kay sath aeytiqaad kerkay Allah Taalaa hi ko pukartay hain. Phir jab woh (bari taalaa) unhen nijat dey ker khushki ki taraf phonchata hai to kuch inn mein say aeytidaal per rehtay hain aur humari aayaton ka inkar sirf wohi kertay hain jo bad-ehad aur na shukray hon
